title: The Golden Thread Untangling the World's Knot:  Who is Willing to Follow the Logos Wherever It Goes?
description:
Mark LeFebvre (who has a great familiarity with John Vervaeke's work) acts as a "cultural" informant for Karen on Vervaeke's views as we discuss the Jordan Peterson/John Vervaeke "psychedelic" conversation. We did a previous video introducing this series entitled: 
The Psychedelic Conversation Creates a Question:  
https://youtu.be/chybRUqE2_A

A play list of all ten episodes analyzing this conversation: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLoARw9zo4EUYEEhM_KIgzl_eW9ZZTHbzh


Here's the Peterson/Vervaeke Conversation: https://youtu.be/DLg2Q0daphE

We did the first 18 minutes of their conversation, and in our next episode, we'll pick up where we left off. We were talking so fast, I didn't get to make many notes.

"Meaning is what we're going to talk about."
Discrete v. continuous signaling
Intelligibility and patterns
Intimacy Crisis rather than Meaning Crisis
  What were the roots of the Intimacy Crisis?
  WW II Rosie the Riveter? or Pin-up Girls?
  The loss of the masculine and feminine
Aspiration/Rationality/Relevance Realization - John's project in a nutshell.

The Jonathan Pageau episode I referenced:
The Inevitability of 'Religion': https://youtu.be/hUQs5PxSi4s
